rankings.title: Who Bears the Burden of Monetary Tightening? Heterogeneous Labor Market Responses and Aggregate Implications
conditions: pre-specifying heterogeneity dimensions to avoid data-mining
using JOLTS/job flows as primary evidence for mechanisms rather than only CES employment levels

rankings.title: Monetary Policy and the Skills Premium
conditions: switching to CPS MORG for wages or another consistent high-frequency wage source
clearly distinguishing wage-rate effects from workforce-composition effects
